      • createTopic

        public static void createTopic​(TopicConfig config)

      • createTopicByCommand

        public static void createTopicByCommand​(TopicConfig config)
        创建主题（采用TopicCommand的方式）
        参数:
        config - String s = "--zookeeper localhost:2181 --create --topic kafka-action " + " --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1" + " --if-not-exists --config max.message.bytes=204800 --config flush.messages=2"; 执行：TopicManager.createTopic(s);
